price: ߘߏ߫ ߘߴߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߞߙߎߝߊߢߐ߲߮ ߘߏ߫ ߕߘߍ߬ ߒߠߋ ߟߊ߫
arabic: قَالَ قَآئِلٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ إِنِّي كَانَ لِي قَرِينٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla qāilun min'hum innī kāna lī qarīnun
